DOC.brief_summary: Safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of single and multiple oral doses of BI 409306 tablets in healthy Chinese and Japanese male volunteers of a known genotype as specified in the study protocol.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of BI 409306 Tablets in Healthy Asian Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male Chinese and Japanese volunteers 2. Age between 20 and 45 years 3. BMI between 18.5 and 25 kg/m2 (Body Mass Index) 4. Known genotype as specified in the study protocol 5. Subjects must be able to understand and comply with study requirements Exclusion criteria: 1. Any deviation from healthy condition
